求.definition: to seek; to look for; to request; to demand; to beseech

求之不得.definition: lit. seek but fail to get (idiom); fig. exactly what one’s been looking for

求人.definition: to ask for help; to ask a favor; to recruit talented people

求人不如求己.pinyin: qiú rén bù rú qiú jǐ
求人不如求己.definition: if you want sth done well, do it yourself (idiom)

求仁得仁.definition: lit. to seek virtue and acquire it (idiom); fig. to have one's wish fulfilled

求偶.definition: to seek a marriage partner; (of an animal) to seek a mate; to court

求助.definition: to request help; to appeal (for help)

求助於人.definition: to call upon others for help

求取.definition: to seek after; to strive for

求同.definition: to seek consensus; to seek conformity

求同存異.definition: (idiom) to put aside differences and work together; to seek common ground and cooperate

求和.definition: to sue for peace; to look for a draw (chess); summation (math.)

求好心切.definition: to demand the highest standards of sb (or oneself) (idiom); to strive to achieve the best possible results; to be a perfectionist

求子.definition: (of a childless couple) to pray for a son; to try to have a child

求存.definition: survival; the struggle to eke out a living; to seek for continued existence

求學.definition: to pursue one's studies; to attend school; to seek knowledge

求得.definition: to ask for sth and receive it; to try to obtain; to look for and obtain

求情.definition: to plea for leniency; to ask for a favor

求救.definition: to seek help (when in distress or having difficulties)

求教.definition: to ask for advice; seeking instruction

求爺爺告奶奶.pinyin: qiú yé yé gào nǎi nǎi
求爺爺告奶奶.definition: lit. to beg grandpa and call on grandma (idiom); fig. to go about begging for help

求生.definition: to seek survival; to possess the will to live

求田問舍.definition: lit. to be interested exclusively in the acquisition of estate (idiom); fig. to have no lofty aspirations in life

求知.definition: anxious to learn; keen for knowledge

求索.definition: to search for sth; to seek; to quest; to explore

求親.definition: to make an offer of marriage (to another family on behalf of one's son or daughter); to seek a marriage alliance

求親靠友.definition: to rely on the help of relatives and friends

求解.definition: to require a solution; to seek to solve (an equation)

求證.definition: to seek proof; to seek confirmation

求購.definition: to seek to purchase; to be looking to buy (sth)

求道於盲.definition: see 問道於盲|问道于盲[wen4 dao4 yu2 mang2]

求醫.definition: to seek medical treatment; to see a doctor

求錘得錘.definition: (neologism c. 2017) (slang) to demand proof of what one believes to be an unfounded accusation only to have irrefutable evidence duly supplied
